facebook.title: Subsidizing truly open access
facebook.summary:
An excellent letter, published in the June 17 Science, by our colleagues from the University of Kansas. Especially note the advice to scholarly societies that publish journals.

This link may work if you don't have access to Science online: https://kuschol
